info.author: Fernando
info.name: modloader-reborn
info.description: minimalistic script that replaces skins, vehicles and weapons from files without any config needed

setting.name: *AMOUNT_MODS_PER_BATCH
setting.desc: How many mods should be loaded together in batches?

setting.name: *TIME_MS_BETWEEN_BATCHES
setting.desc: How many milliseconds should the script wait before loading the next batch of mods?

setting.name: *OUTPUT_SUCCESS_MESSAGES
setting.desc: Should the script show debug messages in the console when a mod is loaded successfully, for example?

setting.name: *WARN_FILE_SIZE_ABOVE_DFF
setting.desc: Should the script warn the server when a DFF file is above X kilobytes (1024 kB = 1 MB)?

setting.name: *WARN_FILE_SIZE_ABOVE_COL
setting.desc: Should the script warn the server when a COL file is above X kilobytes (1024 kB = 1 MB)?

setting.name: *WARN_FILE_SIZE_ABOVE_TXD
setting.desc: Should the script warn the server when a TXD file is above X kilobytes (1024 kB = 1 MB)?
